def_cn: 忸怩的;害羞的;难为情的;不自然的
def_en: Someone who is self-conscious is easily embarrassed and nervous because they feel that everyone is looking at them and judging them.

def_cn: 有强烈自我意识的;高度自觉的
def_en: If you describe someone or something as self-conscious, you mean that they are strongly aware of who or what they are.
